about_the_game:
New officers appear in scenarios for the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

This is a collaboration with the Nijisanji VTubers, namely Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru.
Here is a brief profile of them: Kuzuha is an unemployed vampire who plays video games all day long while sponging on his parents; Sister Claire takes care of the sick, the poor, and orphans; and Debidebi Debiru aims to doom the mankind to corruption.
Please enjoy the unique newcomers joining the scene.

▼Added officers
Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru

▼How to use
Select a scenario from Start New - Select Scenario screen, then select an officer from "Have Orig. Officers Appear" on the Officer Settings screen to have them appear in-game.
From "Position Orig. Officers", by placing the officer on a base, or having them serve a force, they will appear in-game.

Please enjoy the unique newcomers joining the scene.

name: RTK14: Nijisanji VTubers: "Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru" Collaboration Officer Data

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

oflc.descriptors: Mild themes, Violence and coarse language

short_description: This is a collaboration with the Nijisanji VTubers, namely Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support
